title: 更多的炉子Mod(More Furnaces)
author: f841705799
txt_content:
本帖最后由 f841705799 于 2013-9-28 19:23 编辑 

合成表与效率：(以煤炭来计算!！！！！)

铁炉：

所有的都是两格空间铁炉可以烧10.6件物品。金炉：燃料和材料为四格空间，成品有五格空间金炉可以烧20件物品。钻石炉：燃料和材料为七格空间，成品有九格空间钻石炉可以烧40件物品黑曜石炉：相当于两个炉同时在烧，但只要一个燃料所有的格子都为两格地狱岩炉：！！！！！！虽然只有一格，但是！！！！！需要打火石点火！！！！！！接下来就完全不需要燃料！！！！！不科学！！！！！！！！！！！！

版本变化：

1.3.4c:
 - made mod work with 1.5.2
 1.3.4b:
 - fixed crash when hopper interacts with furnaces and Custom Stuff is not installed
 1.3.4:
 - fixed hopper interaction
 1.3.3:
 - updated to 1.5
 1.3.2:
 - updated to 1.4.6
 1.3.1:
 - updated to 1.4.5
 1.3.0:
 - updated to 1.4.2
 - added obsidian and netherrack furnace
 1.2.3:
 - fixed shift clicking issues
 1.2.2b:
 - removed mcmod.info, that caused a crash on forge 230+
 1.2.2:
 - now really changed the tile entity names
 1.2.1:
 - changed tile entity names to not break furnaces from 1.2.5 worlds
 1.2.0:
 - updated to 1.3.2
 1.1.8:
 - updated to 1.2.5
 1.1.7:
 - fixed furnaces crashes game one case
 1.1.6:
 - ported to 2.2.3
 1.1.5:
 - fixed iron furnace crashing the game in some cases
 - added furnaces to the creative inventory
 1.1.4:
 - fixed blazing rods not working as fuel
 1.1.3:
 - updated to 1.1.0
 - changed ids of the slots of the furnaces, so that they work with i.e bc pipes
 1.1.2:
 - fixed a bug that allows you to dupe items
 1.1.1:
 - updated to 1.0.0
 - fixed gold and diamond furnace removes items when more than 2 stacks in input or fuel slots
 - fixed output slots not moving stacks probably
 1.1:
 - the furnaces have now multipy input, fuel and output slots
 - increased the smelting speed of the gold furnace
 1.0.5:
 - fixed furnaces crash game in SMP
 - the mod now uses 3 instead of 6 block ids
 1.0.4:
 - fixed game crashes when shift-clicking an item into a furnace
 - added gui id to the config file
 - changed default gui ids from 16,17,18 to 41,42,43
 1.0.3:
 - fixed game crashes when destroy iron furnace with items in it
 1.0.2:
 - added Minecraft Forge support
 1.0.1:
 - updated to 1.8.1


下载：
